title: Monitor Drilling Fluid Properties
description: A mud engineer on a rig monitors drilling fluid (mud) properties to ensure they remain within the planned specifications for wellbore stability.

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest lab measurements for mud weight, viscosity, and fluid loss.
tasks.expected_outcome: The most recent mud check results are retrieved.

tasks.description: Compare the measured properties against the planned drilling fluid program limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: The comparison shows that mud weight is trending low, approaching the lower limit.

tasks.description: Recommend adding barite to the mud system to increase the mud weight back to the target value.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear instruction for treating the mud system is logged and communicated.
